content: **this design is more than just a simple knitting pattern it s a gift with a particular purpose it was created to extend love and support to those who need it most in difficult times in my country chile we are experiencing a tragedy with wildfires that have claimed lives and left many families homeless therefore this sweater is meant to reach the hands of those affected families like a warm hug amidst adversity however solidarity knows no borders if you find yourself outside of chile i invite you to share your knitting with someone going through a tough time offering them hope and joy along their journey the construction of this sweater knitted seamlessly in the round from the top down with small short row at the neck and circularly knitted sleeves seeks to provide physical comfort and symbolize unity and mutual support in times of need thanks to the help of my testers ** **sizes** 2 4 6 8 10 12 years recommended ease positive ease 3 cm / 1 25 knitted in size 2
